text: Cruelty () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Skuybin.Положительный герой: Николай Крючков пришел в кино от станкаЖестокость It stars Georgi Yumatov, Apollon Yachnitsky, and Boris Andreyev. ==Actors== * Georgi Yumatov as Malyshev * Apollon Yachnitsky as Kostya Vorontsov * Boris Andreyev as Lazar Baukin * Nikolai Kryuchkov as Yefrem Yefremovich, head of criminal investigation * Vladimir Andreyev as Yakov Uzelkov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Cruelty (movie)
